attributes.action: Open the railway line between Portishead and Bristol
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Portishead's population has doubled in the last 10 years due to rampant house building.  No investment has been put into the infrastructure resulting in Portishead becoming the most congested cul de sac in the UK.  
The railway line requires an investment of c. £5m to reopen and link this thriving town with Bristol.
